description: Lists the categories of a Amazon Q Business application environment instance. For more information, see Custom labels for Amazon Q Apps.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

nested_items.name: categories
nested_items.description: The categories of a Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the category.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title or name of the category.

nested_items.name: appCount
nested_items.description: The number of published Amazon Q Apps associated with a category.
